container.description: A series of tools to improve the reading of web pages in badly lit room/other:
container.titleContrast: Automatically adjust the graphical theme of the page to get the better possible contrast. Can badly work with complex graphical themes and/or deform the page.
container.tileTheme: Select a color theme used by this function. A theme includes background color, text color and link color unified for each web page.
container.titleColorInvert: Reverses the color of the images to better stand out on the dark theme.
container.titleBrightness: Decrease the page brightness. You can choose the percentage of brightness decrease.
container.tileNightMode: Applies a orange filter on the page to reduce the blue light emitted by the screen.
